TopicTitle: Good video tutorial,s for a noob

Articles.Content: Hi all,i was wondering can someone plaese tell me who,s video tutorial are best to watch,as i am new to the game and i am totally crap at playing it,most of which is that i havent a clue what sas and other thing do,any help would be great.thanks all:confused:

I couldn't tell you who's are the best, but there's definitely some good ones out there. I have some semi-helpful very lengthy ones in a link in my sig if you care to check them out.

Also check out this thread:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15652-Orbital-Mechanics-101-A-Kerbal-Space-Program-Tutorial

I couldn't tell you who's are the best, but there's definitely some good ones out there. I have some semi-helpful very lengthy ones in a link in my sig if you care to check them out.

Also check out this thread:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15652-Orbital-Mechanics-101-A-Kerbal-Space-Program-Tutorial

^^ THIS ^^ I highly recommend the pebble_garden tutorials they're amazing

When I first got the game I followed along the step by step tutorial for building a Mun lander and rocket to get there, learning to fly it into orbit and adjust your orbit, and finally how to get it to the Mun and land and finally return to Kerbin.
